name: rpg-protocol
description: an on chain protocol for quickly launching games

scripts.abi: cp out/Game.sol/Game.json ../web/src/domain/abi/raw/Game.json && cp out/GameFactory.sol/GameFactory.json ../web/src/domain/abi/raw/GameFactory.json && cp out/ModuleRegistry.sol/ModuleRegistry.json ../web/src/domain/abi/raw/ModuleRegistry.json && cp out/EntityFactory.sol/EntityFactory.json ../web/src/domain/abi/raw/EntityFactory.json

author: rpg-protocol
